goal.ch: 本課程旨在幫助初學者掌握中文的基本聽、說、讀、寫能力，並熟悉日常生活中的常用語句與詞彙，建立與華人進行簡單交流的基礎。學生將學習正確的發音、基礎語法結構，以及使用中文進行基本的自我介紹、詢問方向、購物、點餐等生活情境對話。
goal.en: This course is designed to help beginners acquire basic listening, speaking, reading, and writing skills in Chinese. Students will become familiar with commonly used phrases and vocabulary for everyday life and build a foundation for simple communication with Chinese speakers. The course will focus on proper pronunciation, fundamental grammar structures, and basic conversational skills for situations like self-introductions, asking for directions, shopping, and ordering food.

outline.en:
Pinyin and Pronunciation Practice

Practice recognizing and using the four tones
Basic Vocabulary and Sentence Patterns
Common nouns, verbs, and adjectives
Basic sentence structures: affirmative, negative, and interrogative sentences
Daily Conversations

Asking for directions and describing locations
Conversations in restaurants and shopping
Cultural Experience
Introduction to common Chinese idioms and etiquette
Brief overview of Chinese festivals
Basic Reading and Writing
Learn commonly used Chinese characters
Practice reading and writing simple sentences
